name: [Devtober Entry] Galaxy Space Shooter
description:
A basic, endless 2D space shooter.
---

Controls:

  • Use Arrows or WASD to move around
  • Use the (Left) Mouse Click to interact with the main menu

Power Ups:

  • Triple Shot - Fire three lasers at a time
  • Speed Boost - Double your speed for a short time
  • Shield - Become invulnerable to your next hit

What's next?

This was a learning experience for me. However, I'll revamp the project after the next couple of releases.

First off, I'm targeting the game for Android, so I'll be reviewing the direction in which things move and the entire UI. I'm also changing all the stock graphics and sounds to match a fantasy theme, where you'll control or ride a dragon instead of a spaceship. Different types of power-up and enemies will also be designed. Finally, the game will also feature a storyline / campaign.

Game based on the amazing course from GameDevHQ!

---

Release Notes:

  • Will include a full-screen mode and performance improvements in the next release.
